name: Run em Ghost
description: Run em Ghost is a stealth based roguelike which focuses on puzzle solving to try and escape a mental hospital. You as the main character have the ability to turn into a ghost to help you travers the place, depending on the plane you are you will face different challenges such as ghost that impede your progress and hospital staff trying to prevent your escape. This was developed for Game Jam+ as 5 people team and was made in 48 hours.
